description: This file defines a custom React hook 'useAuth' that provides access to authentication, organizational, and RBAC context data within a React application. It relies on React's useContext hook and an AuthContext to expose user, role, permissions, and organization information, along with helper methods for RBAC checks.

methods.name: useAuth
methods.description: Custom React hook that accesses authentication and authorization context data using React's useContext hook. Throws an error if used outside of an AuthProvider.
